definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: The condiments vary from family to family, but fresh chili powder is a must-have.
sentences.chinese: 調料的口味各家不同，只有現磨的幹辣椒粉必不可少。

sentences.english: Just a little bit in a dressing spoils the whole salad?
sentences.chinese: 僅僅調料汁裏的一點點就弄糟了一整盤色拉？

sentences.english: Combine olive oil, lemon juice and dry ingredients to create marinade.
sentences.chinese: 將橄欖油，檸檬汁和乾的調料混合在一起，做成醃汁。

sentences.english: For Christmas, we stuff the chicken with a mixture of bread and flavourings.
sentences.chinese: 過聖誕節時，我們在雞腹內塞麪包加各種調料。

sentences.english: The food tasted rather bland, so he added some spices to pep it up a little.
sentences.chinese: 這食品太乏味，於是他加了一些調料提提味。

sentences.english: I cursed you for a lifetime to buy instant noodles without seasoning packets.
sentences.chinese: 我詛咒你一輩子買方便麪沒有調料包。

sentences.english: Red chilli peppers have been used for thousands of years as food additives and in traditional medicine.
sentences.chinese: 紅辣椒粉作爲食物調料和傳統藥物已有幾千年歷史了。

sentences.english: Add remaining spices and herbs in the morning and let infuse all day.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早上加入其餘調料和香草，再繼續浸泡一整天。

sentences.english: Avoid the croutons and creamy dressings, which have the opposite effect.
sentences.chinese: 儘量避免蒜香和奶油調料，因爲會產生相反的效果。

sentences.english: All our food products are completely free of artificial flavorings and colorings.
sentences.chinese: 我們加工的所有食品都絕對不攙入人造調料和顏料。

sentences.english: Have a little taste before seasoning, as the clams can be quite salty.
sentences.chinese: 加調料之前嘗一下，因爲蛤蜊會很鹹。

sentences.english: The salad dressing was too lemony.
sentences.chinese: 這種色拉調料的檸檬味太重。

sentences.english: Seasoning have SiChuan broad bean paste, Onions, green red pepper piece.
sentences.chinese: 調料有四川豆瓣醬，洋蔥，青紅椒塊。

sentences.english: Combine dressing and slaw ingredients in a bowl.
sentences.chinese: 在碗中混合調料和沙拉。

sentences.english: If ten-gram tea is added into condiments , there will be tea-stewed eggs.
sentences.chinese: 若在調料中加入茶葉二錢則爲茶雞蛋。

sentences.english: Processing technology and product characteristics of delicious and piquant chafing dish seasoning were discussed mostly.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了鮮辣型火鍋調料的生產工藝及產品特點。
